Two users reused a prime to generate their RSA keys. Now their encrypted secret, 336782382573610996238207090291500704940517477872428569718484534243544583146758087540556387356655722167350826498265314479851787410999200994893681098527373756009487428464816607194469302088073600226629070671236406249296151565435397185, is at risk. Can you recover the original message?

The flag format is flag{...}
n=1123645491940756655071881431348099669868629425532281694305946154181796440252102266659185174659172339457130388245319148339970335533085278821983178555889885688071824589050941629270988331674410411544208146093676900710119335771526837963, n2=837939516261490542413055173961409034138289556121337009713316114561186475576509865835386634977270608710045190981339541067443946827944685084735758011787179903099542361535372583761007640885769442247917045212573677211894608848895576203, e=324153700669708462994570846415048027847932703957396842596070156489287288957844366804288403833281500901326167084031179859062941791566410323613432886090075047241001699588851980487137970846885946320428933085572636704821424009288465471

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{nksvnxrm}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 336782382573610996238207090291500704940517477872428569718484534243544583146758087540556387356655722167350826498265314479851787410999200994893681098527373756009487428464816607194469302088073600226629070671236406249296151565435397185
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=1123645491940756655071881431348099669868629425532281694305946154181796440252102266659185174659172339457130388245319148339970335533085278821983178555889885688071824589050941629270988331674410411544208146093676900710119335771526837963, n2=837939516261490542413055173961409034138289556121337009713316114561186475576509865835386634977270608710045190981339541067443946827944685084735758011787179903099542361535372583761007640885769442247917045212573677211894608848895576203, e=324153700669708462994570846415048027847932703957396842596070156489287288957844366804288403833281500901326167084031179859062941791566410323613432886090075047241001699588851980487137970846885946320428933085572636704821424009288465471
